K = int(input())
S = input()

if len(S) > K:
    print(S[:K] + '...')
else:
    print(S)

K = int(input())
S = input()

if len(S) <= K:
    print(S[:K] + '...', end="")
else:
    print(S)


k = int(input())
s = input()

if len(s) <= k:
    print(s)
else:
    print(s[:k] + "...") 

k = int(input())
s = input()

print(s[:k] if len(s) <= k else s[:k] + "...")

print(1)
